attributes.additional_details: The biggest scandal involving crimes against children needs a full independent public inquiry. These are horrific crimes, covered up by some of the most powerful people in the country. The public would like to demand an inquiry into this scandal and see the people involved held accountable in criminal court for their involvement in allowing this to continue for so many years. We the public demand answers. Crimes against the most vulnerable in this country have gone on too long.
attributes.background:
We the general public demand a public inquiry into the biggest child abuse scandal to ever happen. 
The public and the victims deserve this and the people involved need to be held accountable.
